channel.title: Personal on Robert Chen
channel.description: Recent content in Personal on Robert Chen

item.title: εκδρομή by Dimitra Galani (Greek to English)
item.description: My roommate recommended this song to me in 2022 and I liked it so much I decided to translate it into English. You can play the Greek version here.

item.title: Annabelle by Steff la Cheffe (Swiss German to German)
item.description: This was one of the first Swiss German songs I discovered when I was learning German in high school. You can listen to it here.

item.title: Valet by Erich Arendt (German to English)
item.description: I completed the below translation for DoubleSpeak, a journal for poetry in translation, while an undergraduate at Penn.
